creator: ogee@oldany.cz
text:
We use mod_proxy in apache to pass requests (PHP scripts) to the second apache
(+php5) running same machine .

There is a problem with sending data which has more than 8k. These data aren't
pass to the second apache.

When I use 2.0.54, everything is OK.

I think this is related to PR37145. Could you please give the patch from this
report a try (http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/attachment.cgi?id=16744)?
creator: rpluem@apache.org

text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> I think this is related to PR37145. Could you please give the patch from this
> report a try (http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/attachment.cgi?id=16744)? 

You are right, that bug is about that problem also. Sorry, but I haven't found it.
creator: ogee@oldany.cz

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 37145 ***
creator: rpluem@apache.org
